name: Smartwool PhD Pro Endurance Krar Print Crew Socks - Unisex
categories: PhD Pro Endurance Krar Print Crew Socks
description: Fly along the trails with happy feet. These socks go the distance with technology that amps up durability, and mesh zones that release excess heat, keeping feet cool and dry.Soft merino wool, nylon, elastane and polyester.4-degree elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place.Shred Shield™ and Indestructawool in high-impact areas.Mesh ventilation zones.Virtually Seamless™ toe for chafe-free wear.
